verses.name: 2 Chronicles 18:15
verses.text: And the king said to him, How many times shall I adjure thee that thou say nothing but the truth to me in the name of the Lord?

verses.name: 2 Chronicles 18:16
verses.text: Then he said, I did see all Israel scattered upon the mountains, as sheep that have no shepherd: and the Lord said, These have no master; let them return therefore every man to his house in peace.

verses.name: 2 Chronicles 18:17
verses.text: And the king of Israel said to Jehoshaphat, Did I not tell thee that he would not prophesy good unto me, but evil?
